p: Total time foraging (for enrichment and non-enrichment items) was higher when foraging enrichment was given (23.00 ± 2.11% of time) compared to when exploring enrichment was given (7.37 ± 2.64% of time; F1,11 = 48.37, p < 0.001). There were significant differences in total time foraging based on comparisons of specific enrichment items as well (F6,38 = 23.53, p < 0.001; Figure 3; Table S5).
